_sText:
UPDATED VERSION HERE: http://gamebanana.com/css/maps/167813

Story:

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Terrorists have finally discovered the secret Counter Terrorists' headquarters. Hidden in plain sight in world famous Econ Tower. The Terrorists plan to blow up the command center and the server room to forever cripple the Counter Terrorists. Counter Terrorists must stop them at all costs, by any means necessary. The loss of the Econ Tower HQ would wipe out information on Terrorists all around the world and the repercussions would be dire. This is the most important battle for both teams. Choose your side wisely.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks to TopHattWaffle for the custom textures (RealWorldTextures and RealWorldTextures2 pack).

Special thanks to ECG(East Coast Gaming) clan for beta testing!

Special thanks to KMM_ STRONG_ ARM for help with map fixes.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTALLATION:

Place all files into your:

C:\Program files\Steam\SteamApps\<steam account>counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LEVEL DESCRIPTION: 

Created for the Secret Society Mapping Contest on gamebanana.com

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES:

Custom textures by th3_jugg3rn4ugh7
Nav areas named
Custom textures by TopHATTWaffle


If you have been following this in the WiP, since then I've:
- Fully detailed map
- Reduced detail in some areas
- Optimized map 
- Taken out a lot of models in cubicle area
- Redid bottom right side of map where conference room is
- Added a 3D skybox!


Current issues: Sometimes CTs get stuck together. Will fix in updated version.
